summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Profolio resume builder app - both backend APIs and frontend UI functionality tested successfully

minor_issues.issue: Returns 200 instead of 201 for POST requests
minor_issues.impact: Minor - functionality works correctly, just incorrect status code

minor_issues.issue: No visible error message displayed for invalid login credentials

passed_tests: Landing page loads with Profolio branding and all sections
Resume form sections (Personal, Experience, Education, Skills, Projects)
Pricing page displays correctly with $9.99 and $49.99 options
All backend API endpoints working (14/14 tests passed)
AI features properly restricted to premium users
